title: #OccupyGalleFace continues for 15th consecutive day
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Various groups are still engaged in protests demanding the resignation of the President and the Prime Minister, who did not take any decision to resolve the economic crisis in the country as of yet.

This non-partisan people’s struggle in front of the Presidential Secretariat in Colombo demanding democratic changes including the resignation of the Government led by the President and the Prime Minister continues to be active for the 15th day today (23).
Moreover, a group of people with special needs were also seen joining the protests at Galle Face today.
